languages.text: {n}В течение нескольких минут вы старательно пытаетесь выцарапать ножом ваши инициалы на древнем ксеносском артефакте, однако металл мгновенно исцеляет любые повреждения. С каждым мгновением затея выглядит все более безнадежной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В течение нескольких минут вы старательно пытаетесь нашкрябать ножом ваши инициалы на древнем ксеносском артефакте, однако металл мгновенно исцеляет любые нанесенные ему повреждения. С каждым мгновением эта затея выглядит все более безнадежно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В течение нескольких минут вы старательно пытаетесь выцарапать ножом ваши инициалы на древнем ксеносском артефакте, однако металл мгновенно исцеляет любые повреждения. С каждым мгновением затея выглядит все более безнадежной.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artifact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

{n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasas varios minutos intentando tallar tus iniciales en el antiguo artefacto xenos, pero el metal se recupera inmediatamente de cualquier daño. La empresa parece más fútil a cada momento que pasa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasas varios minutos intentando tallar tus iniciales en el antiguo artefacto xenos, pero el metal se recupera inmediatamente de cualquier daño. La empresa parece más fútil a cada momento que pasa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant quelques minutes, vous essayez de graver vos initiales de la pointe de votre couteau dans l'artefact xénos, mais le métal se répare immédiatement. L'idée vous semble plus futile à chaque instant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant quelques minutes, vous essayez de graver vos initiales de la pointe de votre couteau dans l'artéfact xénos, mais le métal se répare immédiatement. L'idée vous semble plus futile à chaque instant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}古代の異種族のアーティファクトにナイフでイニシャルを刻もうとしばらく腐心したものの、金属に刻まれた傷はすぐに修復されてしまう。時間が経てば経つほど、ますます無意味なことをしているように思えてきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}古代の異種族のアーティファクトにナイフでイニシャルを刻もうとしばらく腐心したものの、金属に刻まれた傷はすぐに修復されてしまう。時間が経てば経つほど、ますます無意味なことをしているように思えてきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你花了几分钟时间，打算把你的名字刻在这件异形造物上，但你每刻一刀，金属上的划痕总会在几秒钟之内复原。你越是徒劳地刻着字，越是觉得这个想法简直是浪费时间。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你花了几分钟时间，打算把你的名字刻在这件异形造物上，但你每刻一刀，金属上的划痕总会在几秒钟之内复原。你越是徒劳地刻着字，越是觉得这个想法简直是浪费时间。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du verbringst mehrere Minuten mit dem Versuch, deine Initialen in das uralte Xenos-Artefakt zu ritzen, doch das Metall heilt jeden Schaden, den dein Messer anrichtet, unverzüglich wieder. Der Gedanke wirkt mit jedem verstrichenen Moment sinnloser.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du verbringst mehrere Minuten mit dem Versuch, deine Initialen in das uralte Xenos-Artefakt zu ritzen, doch das Metall heilt jeden Schaden, den dein Messer anrichtet, unverzüglich wieder. Der Gedanke wirkt mit jedem verstrichenen Moment sinnloser.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Birkaç dakika boyunca kadim zeno eserine bıçağınla adının baş harflerini kazımaya çalışıyorsun ancak metalin aldığı hasar anında düzeliyor. Bu çabaların her geçen dakika daha da manasızmış gibi görünmeye başlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You spend several minutes trying to carve your initials into the ancient xenos artefact with your knife, but the metal instantly heals any damage done to it. The idea seems more pointless with each passing moment.{/n}
